transcript:
Hello.
Hello.
Hello, how are you?
Hello.
Hanji sir, good morning. Mamta bol rahi hu. Ye aapka mail verification karna hai sir. Aap free ho abhi?
Do din ho gaya tha, do din ho gaya tha mail verification. Maine khud kiya tha. Do din pehle complete hua tha.
Thik hai, thik hai. Haan sir, okay okay ho gaya.
Ho gaya tha. Thik hai. Wo isiliye main aapko call kar rahi thi sir. Aur ye payment ka sir kuch bata dete sir.
Main aaj aaya hu bahar se. To main office I am back today. Isko.
Achha achha.
Thik hai. Aap free hoke kar lijiyega mujhe.
Ji ji ji ji ji ji jarur.
Thik hai sir. Thank you. Okay sir. Bye.
Thank you. Yes bye.
summary:
Concerns:

- Mail verification

- Payment information



Resolution:

- Mail verification was completed two days prior



Next Steps: 

- Executive will provide payment information later



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

mail verification, payment
